text: Jam Saqi (Sindhi: ڄام ساقي) (October 31, 1944 – March 5, 2018) was an Pakistani left-wing politician. He was general secretary of the Communist Party of Pakistan. Saqi was in jail for more than 15 years because of his political activities. Saqi died in Hyderabad of kidney failure on March 5, 2018, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Sindh Category:Communists
title: Jam Saqi
